OOC: The Dark Avian is the Decepticon base, not the place Domnijoe and 
Blindchaos crashed, infact it is quite a long distance away from where 
Northlight's chars landed. All of the characters that you are 
following haven't been at the crash site for about 2 days (our time), 
they have been heading towards the Dark Avian. Since your character 
neared the crash site, there is probably no way he could have seen any 
of the bots. Just trying to clear up what looks to be a 
misunderstanding. Jer tells me that Northlight's characters landed in 
Africa. (did they Northlight?) =)


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> As Vampiza nears the crash site he was going to he quickly catches site of 
> Astrotrain, Domnijoe, and Blindchaos. The dark energy being increases his 
> speed quickly and soon appears behind blind chaos and Domnijoe, an evil 
> cackle escaping its mouth.
